TextBlock.Text: OENO: Welcome to <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth,</color> friends! You may find both our <color=orange>campsite</color> and <color=orange>mining site</color> by following the path down into the geyser mountain.
OENO: Of note: Please do not leave this warp receiver's return warp powered and unattended!
OENO: Warp receivers power a return warp that allows travel back to the corresponding warp transmitter one time, after a Nomai has traveled to it.
OENO: An unattended return warp could cause the native species of this planet to be unintentionally sent to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin,</color> leaving them stranded!
OENO: Without any air supply or protection from the heat on that planet, these lives would be gravely endangered by our carelessness.
OENO: A return warp is only powered upon the absence of all entities on the warp receiver. Thus, we advise stalling the return warp until you are ready to return to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin.</color>
